content: List the files in this directory

## Thought

Now I'm going to list the files in this directory, using the `ls` tool.

## Action

```yaml
tool: ls
path: "apps/spellbound/src/views"
recursive: false
```

## Thought

It looks like the given path "appsellbound/views" was not correct in the ls tool. I will try again with the correct path "apps/spellbound/src/views".

## Action

```yaml
tool: ls
path: "apps/spellbound/src/views"
recursive: false
```
